description: This classic recipe has the warm and smoky flavour of paprika which compliments the beef perfectly.
name: Spicy Beef Stroganoff with Cubed Potatoes in Garlic Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, sear the ribeye steak for two minutes on each side, then set aside. And a tbs of canola oil to a heated pot, then add shallots and mushrooms and saute for 6 minutes.
Add the garlic, wine and paprika to the pan and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add the stock and and cream and continue to cook for 10 minutes while stirring to reduce the sauce.
Cut the steak intp strips, removing any fatty bits. Add the steak strips to the pot. Cook for 2 minutes before serving with the potatoes on the side with parsley to garnish.
